name: Second Blink:You Can (Not) Get
description:
A top-down 2D game in which you play as the red crew member, after being accused to be the imposter and ejected from the ship. You have a second chance to eliminate all your friends, but be careful not to get caught! It's a fangame inspired by AmongUs!It started as a challenge and turned out to be fun, so I kept working on it. It has a lot of features that will make the game more interesting, covered by beautiful and stunning visuals.

New and  better animations

Crewmates can speak with the help of speech bubbles

Play against crewmates with an AI that mimics random players

Try to defeat the Colossal and discover a new story

Simple Controls:

-W A S D or Arrows to Move

-RightClick to Kill

A game made by CosminAspra

Published by CosminAspra
